roleset.name: need, obligation
roleset.note: REQUIRE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls order-60-1, require-103. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from require.01-v)
REQUIREMENT-N NOTES: based on verb require.01 (from requirement.01-n)

example.name: active
example.text: Being so fragile and minute, they will require special special robotic handling equipment.

example.name: with ablative
example.text: It may be [the largest settlement]-1 ever required *trace*-1 of a state or local utility.
example.arg: of a state or local utility.

example.name: sentential complement
example.text: The 1988 trade act requires Mrs. Hills to issue another review of the performance of these countries by April 30.
example.arg: to issue another review of the performance of these countries by April 30.

example.name: passivized
example.text: [Sea Containers' subsidiaries]-1 might be required *trace*-1 to place their shares in the open market.
example.arg: to place their shares in the open market.

example.name: args 0 and 1, passivized
example.text: Second , we trimmed more than a month off the time required NONE-* to deliver a finished product .
example.arg: NONE-* ('& ' link to the parent node for "the time")

example.name: light verb
example.text: We don't have a requirement of faith for the job.

example.name: light verb
example.text: We don't have a requirement of faith for the job.
